title: Provision for connectable electrical installation battery
fullText:
If a connectable electrical installation has provision for a battery, or one is provided, then the position and instructions for the installation of the battery and compartment shall be in accordance with Clause 5.4.11.3 and shall be included in the instructions for use.
A notice should be fixed in or near the proposed location stating:
"For instructions on connectable electrical installation battery installation, see the instructions for use."
The instructions for use shall contain a directive that the installation of a battery and compartment needs to be completed by a competent person.
